## BoxFilterBlitter.(constructor)

Creates an instance of BoxFilterBlitter

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(phase: 'horizonal' | 'vertical', kernelSize: number, blurSize: number);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  phase | 'horizonal' \| 'vertical' | phase of the blit operation |
|  kernelSize | number | kernel size |
|  blurSize | number | blur size |
